pages.text: Ate daurom apane raba di mu'afi de vala ate usa janata de vala jisa di vi'apakata asamana ate dharati varagi hai. Uha ti'ara kiti ga'i hai alaha tom darana vali'am de la'i
Jihare loka amiri ate garibi vica kharaca karade hana. Uha guse nu pi'a jana vale hana ate lokam de prati khimavana hana. Alaha neki karana vali'am nu mitara bana'unda hai

Ate ajihe loka ki jadom ko'i khul'hi bura'i kara baithana jam apane apa upara ko'i zulama kara laina tam uha alaha nu yada karake apane papam la'i khima magana. Alaha tom binam kenna hai jo papam nu mu'afa kare ate uha janade-bujhade apane kite upara bhaida (parada) karade hana

Iha loka hana ki unham va badala unham de raba de valom mu'aphi hai. Ajihe baga hana jinham de thale nahiram vagadi'am hana. Uha usa vica sadiva rahinage. Cage kama karana vali'am la'i kiho jiha caga fala hai
Tuhade tom pahilam bahuta sari'am udaharanam guzara cuki'am hana tam dharati upara ghuma phira ke dekho ki ki natija nikali'a jhuthala'una vali'am da
Iha varanana hai lokam la'i ate sikhi'a te nasihata hai darana vali'am la'i
Himata na harom ate dukhi na hovo tusim hi prabhavi rahoge jekara tusim maumina (saradhavana) ho
Jekara tuhanu ko'i cota pahuce tam dusamana nu vi uho jihi hi cauta pahuci hai. Ate asim inham dinam nu lokam de vica badalade rahide ham, tam ki alaha imana vali'am nu jana lave ate nahim bana'unda
